title: SKU-19: Supplier delay → mitigate → stabilize
summary: Sales opens; Supply Chain mitigates inbound risk; Plant stabilizes throughput.

events.msg: Customer requests single-lot quote for ASSY-100 qty 25.
ASN shows Supplier Z delay of 4 days on component C-19.
Planner projects -18% throughput on L2 without C-19.
Alternate supplier Y has 500 pcs available; upgrade to air.
QA to fast-track incoming alternate lot; batch changeovers.
